page.title: 07CAMPING LANDS
page.content: The Camping Lands is called that because they used to play football on there as it was a way of settling arguments, Camping was the name of the game.It is now used for public grounds but you aren't allowed to camp on it (in the sense of caravans).You are allowed to play ball games but we don't play camping now.Before the Norfolk Youth And Community Services building was built Hamonds school was there in the 1960's it was left to rot and to fall down because they had found a better place in the Market Place.The Camping Lands is near Swaffham Church.
